columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the firewall

columns.name: name
columns.description: The descriptive name of the firewall.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the VPC where the firewall is in use.

columns.name: delete_protection
columns.description: A flag indicating whether it is possible to delete the firewall.

columns.name: policy_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the firewall policy.

columns.name: policy_change_protection
columns.description: A setting indicating whether the firewall is protected against a change to the firewall policy association.

columns.name: subnet_change_protection
columns.description: A setting indicating whether the firewall is protected against changes to the subnet associations.

columns.name: encryption_configuration
columns.description: A complex type that contains the Amazon Web Services KMS encryption configuration settings for the firewall.

columns.name: firewall_status
columns.description: Detailed information about the current status of a Firewall.

columns.name: subnet_mappings
columns.description: The public subnets that Network Firewall is using for the firewall.

columns.name: logging_configuration
columns.description: Defines how Network Firewall performs logging for a Firewall.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the firewall
